title: RadioShack
summary: RadioShack, formerly RadioShack Corporation, is an American retailer founded in 1921. In November 2020, Retail Ecommerce Ventures (REV), a holding company owned by Tai Lopez and Alex Mehr, acquired RadioShack. RadioShack operates primarily as an e-commerce website, a network of approximately 500 independently owned, franchised RadioShack stores, and a supplier of parts for HobbyTown USA.
